AirQualityReading.description: AirQualityReading represents an air quality observation from a WAQI monitoring station.

dominantPollutant.description: Dominant pollutant: pm25 | o3 | no2 | so2 | co | pm10.

level.description: AqiLevel classifies the health impact of the US AQI value.

so2.description: SO2 concentration in μg/m³ (spike indicates industrial/volcanic event).

ClimateAnomaly.description:
ClimateAnomaly represents a temperature or precipitation deviation from historical norms.
 Sourced from Open-Meteo / ERA5 reanalysis data.

precipDelta.description: Precipitation deviation from normal as a percentage.

severity.description:
AnomalySeverity represents the severity of a climate anomaly.
 Maps to existing TS union: 'normal' | 'moderate' | 'extreme'.

tempDelta.description: Temperature deviation from normal in degrees Celsius.

type.description:
AnomalyType represents the type of climate anomaly.
 Maps to existing TS union: 'warm' | 'cold' | 'wet' | 'dry' | 'mixed'.

DeforestationAlert.description: DeforestationAlert represents a forest cover loss event from the GFW integrated alert system.

alertType.description: Alert system that detected the loss: GLAD-L | GLAD-S2 | RADD.

areaHa.description: Estimated area of forest loss in hectares.

detectedAt.description: Unix milliseconds of the first detection.

nearStrategicSite.description: Whether the alert falls within 50 km of a military base, mine, or pipeline.

Error.description: Error is returned when a handler encounters an error. It contains a simple error message that the developer can customize.

message.description: Error message (e.g., 'user not found', 'database connection failed')

FieldViolation.description: FieldViolation describes a single validation error for a specific field.

description.description: Human-readable description of the validation violation (e.g., 'must be a valid email address', 'required field missing')

field.description: The field path that failed validation (e.g., 'user.email' for nested fields). For header validation, this will be the header name (e.g., 'X-API-Key')

GeoCoordinates.description: GeoCoordinates represents a geographic location using WGS84 coordinates.

GetPollutionGridRequest.description: GetPollutionGridRequest specifies the bounding box for Sentinel-5P pollution data.

GetPollutionGridResponse.description: GetPollutionGridResponse contains Sentinel-5P derived pollution tiles for the requested area.

acquiredAt.description: Unix milliseconds when the latest Sentinel-5P overpass was processed.

GetWeatherForecastRequest.description: GetWeatherForecastRequest has no required parameters; returns pre-defined strategic locations.

GetWeatherForecastResponse.description: GetWeatherForecastResponse contains 7-day weather forecasts for strategic locations.

fetchedAt.description: Unix milliseconds when forecasts were fetched.

ListAirQualityReadingsResponse.description: ListAirQualityReadingsResponse contains air quality readings from WAQI monitoring stations.

fetchedAt.description: Unix milliseconds when data was fetched.

ListClimateAnomaliesRequest.description: ListClimateAnomaliesRequest specifies filters for retrieving climate anomaly data.

minSeverity.description:
AnomalySeverity represents the severity of a climate anomaly.
 Maps to existing TS union: 'normal' | 'moderate' | 'extreme'.

ListClimateAnomaliesResponse.description: ListClimateAnomaliesResponse contains the list of climate anomalies.

ListDeforestationAlertsRequest.description: ListDeforestationAlertsRequest filters Global Forest Watch alert queries.

strategicOnly.description: Only return alerts near strategic infrastructure (military bases, pipelines, cables).

ListDeforestationAlertsResponse.description: ListDeforestationAlertsResponse contains GFW integrated deforestation alerts.

fetchedAt.description: Unix milliseconds when data was fetched.

PaginationRequest.description: PaginationRequest specifies cursor-based pagination parameters for list endpoints.

cursor.description: Opaque cursor for fetching the next page. Empty string for the first page.

pageSize.description: Maximum number of items to return per page (1 to 100).

PaginationResponse.description: PaginationResponse contains pagination metadata returned alongside list results.

nextCursor.description: Cursor for fetching the next page. Empty string indicates no more pages.

totalCount.description: Total count of items matching the query, if known. Zero if the total is unknown.

PollutionGridTile.description: PollutionGridTile represents a single 0.1° × 0.1° pollution measurement cell.

acquiredAt.description: Unix milliseconds of the Sentinel-5P overpass.

aod.description: Aerosol optical depth (dimensionless, proxy for particulate load).

cloudCoveragePct.description: Cloud coverage percentage (0–100); high values reduce measurement quality.

no2MolPerM2.description: Tropospheric NO2 total vertical column density in mol/m².

so2MolPerM2.description: Total SO2 vertical column density in mol/m².

ValidationError.description: ValidationError is returned when request validation fails. It contains a list of field violations describing what went wrong.

WeatherForecastZone.description: WeatherForecastZone represents a 7-day weather forecast for a strategic geographic location.

extremeEventType.description: Primary extreme event type if applicable: flood | hurricane | drought | none.

floodRiskScore.description: Compound flood risk score (0–100) derived from soil moisture and precipitation forecast.

forecastFrom.description: Unix milliseconds marking the start of the forecast window.

forecastUntil.description: Unix milliseconds marking the end of the forecast window.

maxWindSpeedKmh.description: Maximum forecast wind speed in km/h over the 7-day window.

precipitationMm7d.description: Total predicted precipitation in mm over the 7-day forecast window.

post.description: GetPollutionGrid retrieves Sentinel-5P derived NO2/SO2 column density for a bounding box.
GetWeatherForecast retrieves 7-day weather forecasts for strategic global locations.
ListAirQualityReadings retrieves real-time AQI readings from WAQI monitoring stations globally.
ListClimateAnomalies retrieves temperature and precipitation anomalies from ERA5 data.
ListDeforestationAlerts retrieves GFW integrated forest loss alerts near strategic sites.
